channel.title: Help with making custom teleports
channel.description: Hey everyone im trying to add custom teleports on my server right now there set to regular with lumbridge,varrock etc. and i was to make it have like pking teleports,minigame, etc. like just all the other teleports that other servers have. im using a project insanity source. the person who helps me with this will be mod in my new server.

item.title: Help with making custom teleports
item.dc:creator: @Untrimmed Untrimmed
item.description:
@Untrimmed wrote:

Well what kind of server do you have? We may be able to help you out from there.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with making custom teleports
item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995
item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

[quote=“Untrimmed, post:6, topic:382847”]Heres the code for making claws donator only:if(wearID == 8002 && donator == 0){ sM("You must be a donator to wear this item."); return false; }
You would put this in your public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) method. You might have to change the item id and the donator to match your servers.[/quote]
Yeah it isnt working people are still able to spawn claws when they arent donator or anything im not sure if my server is different from yours .

Read full topic

item.title: Help with making custom teleports
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

untrimmed is right. he has the correct method added in. although not all servers are the same, so the donator == 0 might be like assult == 0 or what ever

Read full topic

item.title: Help with making custom teleports
item.dc:creator: @Untrimmed Untrimmed
item.description:
@Untrimmed wrote:

Heres the code for making claws donator only:if(wearID == 8002 && donator == 0){ sM("You must be a donator to wear this item."); return false; }
You would put this in your public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) method. You might have to change the item id and the donator to match your servers.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with making custom teleports
item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995
item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:382847”]im not sure how to exactly but heres a snippit from my server for a staff only item that might help you out:

	{
		if ((playerEquipment[playerRing] == 773)) {
			remove(playerEquipment[playerRing], playerRing);
			sendMessage("You need to be Staff to wield this.");
		}
	}[/quote]

it didnt work ummm is there a tutorial i can goto to figure out how like could you send me a link for one because i just made a spawn server and it alows people to spawn everything like all the items and i want some items to be donator.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with making custom teleports
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

im not sure how to exactly but heres a snippit from my server for a staff only item that might help you out:

	{
		if ((playerEquipment[playerRing] == 773)) {
			remove(playerEquipment[playerRing], playerRing);
			sendMessage("You need to be Staff to wield this.");
		}
	}

Read full topic

item.title: Help with making custom teleports
item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995
item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

Jc22493:

Change the coordinates of each case in the clickingMost class or whatever class handles clicking.

Thank you so much for your help it worked and hey ive got another problem ive made a spawn server and im trying to make some items donator only like, ags, claws, chaotics,statius,vesta’s and stuff like that can u send me the codes and how to do it like tell me how because ive tried some other tutorials and it didnt work.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with making custom teleports
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Change the coordinates of each case in the clickingMost class or whatever class handles clicking.

Read full topic
